# cardio.mri

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `cardio.mri` is to implement code for cardiomyopathy analyses from structured data and magnetic resonance imaging through an integrated deep learning approach.
